inn1.comm: starts off with a real full one, just short of the blockhole on the off stump line, jabbed out to the off side.
lands on a length outside off stump and moves further away, left alone
back of length, kicks up outside off stump and he gets on his toes to defend it down the track
extra-cover drive to get off the mark. He got forward to drive a full delivery leaving him through the off side. Eye-catching stroke.
turns a delivery on the pads to fine leg for a single
around the off stump, coming in a touch and pushed to covers
shaping away off the length and he shapes to poke before withdrawing it at the last minute.
Nazimuddin cracks a short of length delivery outside off stump through backward point and by the time Ishant got across from wide third man he ran two
fuller and he mistimes a drive to mid-off.
short of length, on the middle and leg, tucked behind square leg for a single.
jumps at the body from short of length , fended towards square leg for a single
leans forward to tap a length delivery close on the off side and immediately shouts, "Run run run" and they cross over in time
a bouncer and Tamim sways away.
rushing through the channel outside off stump, Tamim thinks about  offering a shot before deciding against it.
a tad fuller, on the good length, outside off and Tamim mistimes a drive towards mid-off. He wanted to knife it on the up.
closer to the off stump, on a length, leans forward to push to covers
leans forward to drive to mid-off
brings this one in from wide of the crease, it evades the waft and runs off the pad to the on side. After being driven for a boundary in the earlier over, RP has shortened his length a bit
outside the off stump, full in length, holding its line, Nazimuddin flashes it off the outer edge to left of third man
on the middle and leg, Tamim clips it crisply past square leg
beaten outside off stump. It was slanted across Tamim who tried to punch a short-of-length delivery on the up through cover point
drifts to the pads, turned straight to square leg.
dropped by Gambhir at square leg. Fullish, on the leg and middle line, flicked to right of Gambhir, who is standing to the right of the umpire, lunges to his right but palms it.
shifts his line to outside off, driven to mid-off.
just outside off stump, full in length, driven to covers
on the off stump line, straightening a touch and Nazimuddin gets his bat in the line to defend
again getting it to straighten around the off stump and Nazimuddin makes sure to bring his bat down straight and defends to the off side
fires in a bouncer, Nazim hooks and gets a profitable top edge and the ball flies over Dhoni
short of length, slanted across Nazimuddin who cuts to backward point.
Caught at third man. Another short and climbing delivery outside off, Nazimuddin went for the upper cut but sent it straight to the debutant Ojha who pouches it safely
leans forward to defend a delivery leaving him.
full in length, on the off stump, driven to covers
drifts to the middle and leg line - he has done it a few times against the left-hander, wristed to right of Gambhir at square leg.
length delivery outside off stump, Tamim shapes to drive on the up through covers but the bottom-hand comes off the handle and the ball runs off the inner edge to short fine leg
just outside off stump, run down to third man. Remember this is the all new Ash who likes to get his eye in, accumulate runs before going for his shots. Let's see how he goes today
fuller but again on that leg and middle line and flicked to deep square leg.

bouncer and Ash takes it on his left shoulder. He made sure he dropped his wrists and got the bat out of the way. Brian Close, the former Eng batsman, once said, "There is no such thing as pain." Mad man. Extremely brave cricketer.
angling away, left alone
fuller in length and leans forward to defend to the off side. Two slips in for Ashraful

straightens off a length on the off stump line, Ashraful gets into a side-on position to cut but is surprised and cramped as the ball holds its line but manages to stab it behind the stumps towards gully
this time gets the cut shot working well as this ball slants across him and will pick a single to right of the wide third man

digs it short, Tamim hops to get on top of the bounce, taps it close on the off side and wants a single but is sent back by his captain. Tamim points to the area where the ball went and suggests there was a run in it.
Ah! the good old Ash bleeds through. He moved outside off stump and tries to paddle a delivery dug in short and just outside leg stump. Misses.

slapped to point boundary. He went down on his knee to slice a full pitched delivery to left of backward point where Raina dives and gets his fingers on the ball. It was traveling too fast for him to have any realistic chance of reaching it.
driven to wide mid-off for a single
lands on the leg and middle, moves in a touch, worked to Gambhir at square leg.
yorker length delivery on the off and middle, Tamim digs it out back to the bowler.
yet again Gony drifts to the leg and middle line to the left-hander and Tamim flicks it through midwicket. He has to work more on bowling to the left-handed batsmen.
And yep, another one in that line and what's more, serves a full toss. Blink. Flick shot. The ball is being picked up from the square leg boundary.
well outside the off stump, left alone. He remarks his guard with the shoe spikes, taps the bat on the pitch and gets ready to face the next ball
closer to the off stump, straightening a touch, Ash stops his front foot movement, gets his bat in front of the pad, taps it towards mid-off and runs with the stroke.
turned to square leg for a single
short and rising, well outside the off stump, Ashraful tries to upper cut it but can't reach it
fires in a yorker on the middle and leg stump line, Ashraful just about manages to jam his bat down in a hurry, just before his boots and the ball runs off the inner edge to fine leg boundary
RP goes round the stumps and serves a short and wide delivery, flashed to third man boundary
straighter and defended to mid-off
lands it on a length on the middle and off, moves it towards off stump and pushed back down the track
on a length, on the middle stump line, holding its line and turned to midwicket
gets forward to defend a length delivery to the on side
Gorgeous straight drive. Tamim leaned into it well and caressed it down the ground. The head was over the ball and the right elbow very high.
slanted across Tamim who flashes it off the outer edge to third man boundary
on the middle stump line, defended off the front foot
short, wide, too wide and Ash can't reach
Similar delivery, another wide and Ashraful doesn't even bother playing a shot this time
Hmm.. deja-vu.
again well outside the off stump, Ash misses a cut shot.

beaten on the cut again. Width offered outside off and Ashraful tried to cash in. He then practises leaving it. Old Ash v New Ash. The clash is on. Hopefully, in a while, he will learn to balance both the traits and get his shot selection better. Having said that, this ball deserved to be cut
fuller, closer to the off stump and Ashraful lets it go through to Dhoni
drifts to the pads and Ashraful glances it fine for yet another boundary. Bangladesh are doing very well here
cuts and connects well but can't beat the backward point fielder.
length delivery outside off stump, left alone
back of length, straightening on the middle and leg line, worked to square leg
shifts his line to the off stump and defended back to him. Ishant fields and throws the ball to covers for the fielders to shine.
at the rib cage this time - Arabinda Singh must be happy - fended to square leg

almost caught at first slip. Tamim tried to leave a length delivery angling away from him but he was late in doing so and it ran off the face of the bat but fell short of the first slip where Robin can only make a half-stop
short-of-length delivery on the off stump, defended to the off side
beaten outside the off stump. He went hard into a drive to a full pitched delivery outside off stump and the top-hand came off the handle - usually the bottom-hand comes off - and couldn't connect
slower one, outside off stump, defended to covers. Ashraful goes for some gardening down the track. One slip in for him.

2nd catch for the debutant Ojha. This time at mid-off. Ashraful drove a full length delivery to left of Ojha but couldn't get the elevation that he wanted. Ashraful is livid with himself; bangs the bat on the ground before walking off. Nice little moment, though, for Gony; his first international wicket.
fullish delivery outside off stump,  uppish  square drive past backward point
beaten outside off. Too close to cut but he tries nevertheless.
gets forward to defend a slower one to the off side
again on the leg stump line, speed gun says 121 kmph, misses a flick and it runs off the pad
on the pads, turned to fine leg
full and on the off stump line, pushed to covers
back of length outside off stump, left alone
crashed through cover point. He went forward to a length delivery outside off stump and slaps it through the off side field.
on the off stump line, shaping in a touch, full, driven to mid-on
slower one, full, on the middle and off, Raqibul waits for the ball to arrive and defends to the off side
leans forward to a drive a length delivery on the up between the bowler and mid-off. He was looking to hit it to the right of mid-off but the bat-face shut a touch but no harm done.
turns to square leg, Raqibul wanted a single, was down mid-way and had to get back quickly to beat the throw
short and climbing outside off, Tamim tries to help it over slips but can't connect
back to the leg and middle line - Gony has been guilty of that against the left-handers - turned past square leg
And again. Short of length this time and it's worked through midwicket
off cutter outside off stump, driven to covers
the two slips watch as Tamim leans forward to defend a length delivery on the middle and off stump line
probing delivery outside off, lifting from short of length and Tamim pushes inside the line and is beaten
on the pads and they pick up a leg bye. Ojha fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's  end but the batsman was inside the crease
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to the off side
full in length, outside off stump, pushed to covers
full pitched delivery, pushed to left of mid-off for a comfortable single
on middle and leg, pushed to the square-leg region
floated on the leg and middle, runs off the pad to the on side
again on that leg and middle line, nudged behind square leg
on the off and middle line, slight turn, pushed to the off side
short of length, outside off stump, cut to deep point
leans forward to defend to the on side
cutting in towards middle stump, pushed to mid-on
full in length, cutting in to the middle stump line, defended to covers
Lovely shot through the packed off side. He leaned forward, waited for the length delivery to come to him before driving it through extra cover.
Ishant comes back well with a slower one which beats Raqibul
on the middle stump line, cutting, Raqibul stays adjacent to the line and defends to the off side
floated on the middle, plays for the non-existent turn and edges it back down the track
fuller, outside off stump, Tamim is struck on the pad as he misses the sweep.
tickles a full delivery on middle and leg, behind square leg and the leg slip fielder runs across to pick it up
goes back to turn it behind square leg
backs away to cut a delivery outside off stump to backward point. It was in the air but fell short of Ishant
edged past Robin at first slip. It was too full to force it off the back foot but Tamim tried and edged it to left of Robin
full and just outside off stump, mistimes a drive to mid-off
leans forward to drive to deep cover
leans forward to defend a length delivery
Excellent off drive. Full pitched outside off stump and creamed through wide mid-off

Super catch by Dhoni, diving to his right. It was down the leg side, Tamim tickled it fine but Dhoni intercepted it. Not a wicket-taking delivery and Ishant looks rather sheepish. Acrobatic effort by his captain, though. Tamim falls after scoring his 7th ODI fifty
gets forward to defend a length delivery
turning in from off and middle, worked to square leg
on the off and middle, turned to the on side
turns in from outside off, dabbed to left of short third man
nudges a delivery turning into off stump to cover point
leans forward to defend a full delivery on the off stump
stretches forward to sweep over midwicket. He saw the big gap there and played with the turn.
Clubbed over long-off. He charged down the track, made room by moving to the leg side and biffed a flighted delivery over long-off
turning past the off stump, Raqibul is beaten by the turn
pushes a flighted delivery on the off and middle to extra cover
turn and bounce. It landed short of length on middle and off and spta away, Rahim tried to follow it but withdraws the bat at the last minute
fuller, on the middle and off and Rahim stays back to defend
slower in the air, fuller, draws the batsman forward who obliges and taps it cautiously to the off side
on the off stump line, not much turn, pushed to on side and Yusuf rushes across to make the stop
turns in to middle, squeezed off the inner edge to short fine leg
pushed towards mid-on, set off for a single but Yusuf intercepted it and he got back in time
steps down the track and pushes it down to long-on for a single
goes back to punch a short and flat delivery to long-on
down the leg side and Dhoni gathers
full, on the off and middle, driven to long-on
short of length, turning away, cut to point

What a ripping turner. First international wicket. Lovely delivery. It drifted in to the middle and leg stump line, gripped the surface and spun sharply past the defensive poke to crash into the top of the off stump.
outside the off stump, turns away past the poke again
Dhoni had said he reckoned this pitch would take turn and it is doing so. Another unsure poke, beaten again
goes back to work a full delivery to wide midwicket
full on the middle, eased to long-on for a single
leans across to push a full delivery to point
tossed up full on the off and middle line, driven to long-on.
flighted delivery on the off and middle has been sent down to long-on
turns in from outside off stump, chopped to short third man.
get on the front foot and drives to covers
full, on the middle and off line, driven with the turn through covers
around the off stump, steered to the off side
goes back to turn it to square leg
slower through the air, outside off, guided to backward point
lands outside leg, turns in to hit the pad
goes back to wrist a delivery turning into leg and middle line behind square leg and sprints across to come back for the second
arm- ball but short of length and Rahim rocks back to force it to long-off
floated on the off stump, pushed to left of Yuvraj who lunges to make the stop
another one on short of length and punched down to long-off
full and on the middle and leg line, tickled to fine leg
drifting to the legs, turned to Rohit at long leg
turning outside off stump, short of length ,cut to backward point. Ojha suggests he is not happy with the length; he wants to make the batsman drive
does so this time, flights it full and Kapali leans forward to defend
defended to the off side
fuller and driven to long-off. Raina tried to cut it with a dive from short extra cover and has hurt his right hand. He runs off the field to get more attention.
sweeps a full delivery from outside off to deep square leg

arm-ball and the batsman stretches across and is struck on the pad, trying to defend. They shout a lbw appeal but Taufel doesn't relent. He was struck in front of off stump, hawk eye says it would have hit off.
on the off stump line, coming in with the arm, tapped to cover point for a quick single
leans forward to defend
short and outside off stump, Rahim went back to cut it fine through backward point

almost run out. Yuvraj doesn't collect the throw properly and Rahim survives. It was pushed close on the leg side, Dhoni rushed across, took the gloves off and whipped in a throw to Yuvraj who broke the stumps with his hands before collecting the ball. He was trying to gather the ball in front of the stumps and in the process dislodged the bails. And Yuvraj has hurt his hand
goes back to defend to the off side
eased down to long-on
slow loopy delivery lands on the off stump and spins past the defensive blade
Kapali responds well by late cutting a delivery outside off stump past short third man
quicker one on the off stump and Kapali goes right back to defend
turns after landing short of length around off  stump, Kapali opens the bat face to steer to backward point
flighted full around off stump, Kapali shapes to slog sweep and edges it through vacant slip region
outside off stump, turning away from short of length, cut to third man
turns in from outside off stump, slow through the air, dabbed to the on side
leans forward to nudge a flighted delivery down the track
stretches across to paddle a delivery from outside off
flatter, quicker, and pushed with the turn to midwicket
short of length, turning in towards off stump, guided to cover point for a single
leans forward to defend and is struck on the body
turning away from Kapali who steers it to backward point
The slog sweep is working. Imperious. He went down on his knee to heave it over midwicket boundary.
on the middle, tapped to the on side
full and on the middle and off, defended to the off side
slower through the air and Kapali goes back to dab it against the turn to midwicket
sharp turn and Rahim is beaten, trying to defend. To his credit, however, he didn't chase the ball; just pushed down the line
goes back to push a full delivery to point
turns in from outside off, pushed to the onside and Yusuf intercepts
fuller, turning in, checks his drive and the ball rolls back to the bowler
quicker and defended with the full face of the bat

dropped by the diving Gony at long-on. It was chipped towards him and he ran in, appeared to have judged it initially, but was surprised as it dipped on him and he lunged but couldn't quite get his palm under the ball.
on the middle and leg, Kapali gets forward to push it to the on side
top edges a sweep to Ishant at long leg
leans forward to push a full delivery to midwicket
leans forward to steer a delivery outside off to backward point
on the off stump line, he wanted to push it to the off side but it runs off the inner edge to leg side
comes down the track, reaches the pitch of a flighted delivery on middle and drives, with the turn, to long-off
Kapali presses his front leg across and dabs a delivery on the middle to midwicket
turning in to the pad, misses the glance and it bounds off the pad
turns into middle and off, pushed to the on side
works his wrists to turn a delivery on the off stump to Robin at square leg
gets forward and swings a full delivery from outside off to wide long-on. Good clean hit.
flatter, worked to square leg
flat, shorter and quicker, pushed back to the bowler
comes down the track to drive to extra cover
Ojha picks his second wicket.  It turned slightly from short of length and Rahim saw the length and went for the cut but was done in there by the extra bounce. Dhoni takes a smart catch.
leans forward to drive to left of Ojha
goes back to push through backward point
leans forward to turn it to midwicket
on the off stump line, worked to midwicket
gets a leading edge on the drive and it lobs to mid-off and down to the long-off fielder
full and on the middle, worked to midwicket
goes back to wrist a delivery turning to leg stump to long leg
leans forward to punch to the bowler
on the middle stump line, worked to square leg
on a good length, comes forward and pushes it to mid off
fuller on the leg stump, Mahmudullah flicks it to midwicket, he needs to be a little bit more squarer if he wants runs
outside the off stump, pushes to deep point
on a good length outside the off stump, Kapali tries to have a swing but is beaten by the movement
outside the off stump, Kapali comes forward and pushes it to point but Raina intercepts it and has Mahmudullah in a spot of bother, but does not bring the stumps down
outside the off stump again, cut to point for a single
on the off stump, looks to push it on the leg side but gets a leading edge, which falls short of mid off
on the leg stump, pushes it firmly to deep midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, cut late to short third man
on the off stump, comes forward and defends it
on the middle and leg, Mahumudullah turns it to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, comes forward and defends
outside the off stump, comes forward and pushes it to sweeper cover for a single
on a good length on the off stump, Kapali comes forward and creams a drive to sweeper cover for a single
fuller on the off stump, Mahmudullah pushes it to mid on for a single
full pitched outside off stump, mistimes a drive to the off side
cracking stroke to deep point boundary. There was a sweeper cover and Kapali delayed the shot to force the short-of-length delivery to left of backward point
goes back to push it back to the bowler
gets this one past the bowler and to long-on
dabbed to backward square leg
full outside off, driven to long-off
turns in , worked to Robin at backward square leg
leans forward to push to left of covers for a single
short of length delivery angling away from the off stump, he shuffles across to wrist it to wide midwicket
leans forward to dab a short of length delivery to left of backward point and by the time the wide third man fielder came across, they pick up couple of runs
leans forward to length delivery to the backward point
length delivery just outside leg stump, tries to drive to the on side, gets a inside edge and it runs off the pad to short third man
well outside off stump, can't connect with the square drive
closer to the off stump and driven to Yuvraj at extra cover
Kapali brings up his 6th ODI fifty with a super slog sweep over midwicket. Back in the dressing room Ashraful looks pretty happy and signals to Kapali to carry on with his merry ways
Another slog sweep. Another six. This is fab stuff from Kapali. He went down on his knee to dispose it up over the boundary ropes
turns this flatter delivery to midwicket
gets forward to ease a full delivery to long-on
flat and quick on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
lands outside leg stump on a length, moves in towards the hips, tucked past square leg
full and angling away from Mahmudullah who tries to loft it over the infield and gets a thickish edge over backward point.
from round the stumps, lands it full on off and middle, turned to midwicket
on the off and middle line but Mahmudullah whips it across the line behind square leg. Very wristy stroke.
Kapali is unstoppable. Slashes a full length delivery outside off over backward point.
drives down the ground to long-off and will retain the strike
superbly timed lofted off drive. It was full and outside off, He bent his back knee and drove it inside-out to wide long-off region.
six over extra cover! Kapali is da maan. He reached out to a wide length delivery outside off and knifed it up and over the ropes. Ojha was there but it sailed just over the ropes.

Shot boss! Kapali is turning on mesmerizing display of hitting here. All clean swings of the bat. He thrust his front leg out and fisted a length delivery over wide long-on. He punches the gloves of the non-striker and breaks into a big smile.
outside off stump, attempts to slice it past backward point but misses
short of length delivery on off and middle, Kapali is early into the pull shot and drags it past square leg
Mahmuddallah rocks back to pull a short-of-length delivery to wide midwicket region. Bangladesh are galloping in style.
goes for the slow yorker on the off and middle line but Kapali picked it, took it on full and swatted it superbly through midwicket. Lovely piece of timing there.
low fast full toss, pushed to the bowler.
another low full toss, this time well outside off stump, square driven past the diving Robin Uthappa at backward point. The ball fell just short of the lunging Robin who deflected it to sweeper cover
moves outside off stump and tries to paddle scoop, misses but will pick up a leg bye
beaten by the slower one. Kapali was looking to push it to cover point for a single but couldn't connect

waist-high full toss outside off stump and Kapali reaches his highest ODI score with a well-controlled slice through backward point. That was at a awkward height - my first reaction was it would be a no-ball- but Kapali managed to get on top of it really well.
yorker from round the stumps, dug out to the off side
just short of the block hole, on the off stump, stabbed to extra cover
down the leg side and Kapali lets it go through
kicks up from back of length, just outside off stump, Kapali arches back to get on top of the bounce and steers it down to Ishant at third man
on the legs, the batsman fails to put it away, He wanted to turn it behind square leg but missed and it rolled off the pad to the off side
backs away to drive a length delivery coming in towards middle, from round the stumps, to long-on
The Nataraja pull shot. Kapil Dev's fans would know. Up went the left leg, down came the bat and he superbly found the deep backward square leg boundary. What a gem of a knock from Kapali.
low full toss, dabbed to midwicket and that will bring Kapali on strike
fullish one outside off stump, Kapali crouched, got the bat in a horizontal position and dabbed the ball to wide third man

And that's his hundred. Another full delivery and he repeated the  earlier shot to the right of third man. He reached the other end, paused, turned, took the helmet off and raised the bat towards his delighted team-mates standing in the pavilion. Take a bow Kapali, this has been a delightfully yummy knock
driven through covers for a single
yorker length outside off stump, Kapali tries to run it down to third man again but can't connect this time.
moves outside leg stump, Ishant sends a slower one outside off, Kapali is late to pick it up and then tries to move towards the line and offers a check drive but again can't connect.
on the legs, tries to pull it away, misses but will pick a leg bye
dropped by Gambhir at long-off. The Indians have caught this virus in Pakistan. Kapali lofted a length delivery to right of Gambhir who ran a few yards and lunged but couldn't hold on

Edged to third man boundary. The white ball is disappearing everywhere. Kapali backed away and tried to pull a short of length delivery but edged it over the slip region, Ishant makes an valiant attempt to get under it but can't reach it
fuller and dragged to left of midwicket where Raina mis fields
sails down leg side, Dhoni doesn't gather cleanly but recovers quickly. The batsmen get across to have a chat
The Kapali show is on. Imperious thrust of the front foot down the track, clean swing of the bat and the short-of-length delivery disappears to wide long-on.
fires in a yorker, stabbed to the off side
slower one, on the middle and leg stump line, too early into his pull and they rush across for a quick leg bye and Gony running on  kicked it on to the stumps but the batsman was in
another slower one but down the leg, this time. Kirsten is scribbling furiously on his notepad. Just write Kapali and stare admiringly, Gary!
short of length delivery and it has been flat-batted to left of long-off
yorker, dug out to the on side and Kapali will be on strike

swing and a miss. It was a length delivery on the middle stump line, the ball flies to Dhoni, the batsmen rush across, Dhoni misses at the striker's ends, the ball comes back to Gony who misses at the non-striker's end and overthrows!

A stunning innings has come to an end by an equally stunning catch by Ojha at deep midwicket. Kapali had top edged a pull and Ojha rushing forward , dived with both palms outstretched and as the ball came down, the left hand slipped off the position but the right palm came under the ball. But the man of the moment is Alok Kapali. What an entertaining knock.
swung to deep square leg region for two runs and Bangladesh end on a strong 283. Game on.

inn2.comm: Gambhir starts the chase with a cut to deep point boundary. Short of length and width offered outside off and Gambhir cashed in.
taps a length delivery on middle to the leg side and they cross over for a single. Gambhir walks down to have a chat with Robin.
full in length, outside off stump, shaping in, Robin is touch late in getting forward and pushes outside the line and edges it to the on side. One slip and gully in.
on the off stump line, Robin gets behind the line to defend to covers.
pushes a length delivery to wide mid-off for a single

pushes a length delivery with soft hands. Too soft as the ball rolls back just past the off stump. Robin senses a single in there and calls over Gambhir who responds. Rahim is quick to get to the ball and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end and had he hit, Gambhir would have been found just short of the crease.
Quite similar to the last delivery. Again Rahim is in there quickly and this time underarms a throw at the striker's end but it was enough velocity to run through wide mid-off to the boundary
turns a delivery coming in to square leg
back of length, outside off stump, Robin shuffles across, punches it to left of covers where Farhad Reza makes a diving stop
length delivery straightens outside off stump, steered to left of backward point and this time Raqibul dives to stop it.
short of length, punched well to mid-off. Wasim Akram, on air, reckons Shahadat needs to get lot closer to the stumps
gets behind a length delivery to push it to mid-on
quick single taken to backward square leg.
lands on a length, comes in towards off and middle, placed to right of mid-on for a single
off cutter on the middle and off line, Gambhir defends to the off side.

edged but falls short of the 'keeper. Another off cutter and Gambhir followed this one with an open face of the bat in an effort to run it through to third man but the ball ran off the face of the bat
short of length, just outside off stump, not much room but since Gambhir stays beside the line, he manages to cut it but cant' beat the short cover point fielder
comes down the track, as is his wont these days, and drives a full length delivery to mid-off
leans forward to push a full length delivery to mid-off

Robin is cleaned up! Really full delivery, short of the blockhole, though, and Robin  is struck on the crease, stabs it off the inner edge to the stumps. He ended up walking into it after he had played the drive; the feet were glued to each other when he played the shot. The fielders get in a huddle and jump up and down!
well timed cover drive to get off the mark. The fielder made a half-stop
full and outside the off stump, left alone
leans forward to on drive a full pitched delivery through wide mid-on region
down the leg side, edges a glance to short fine leg region
on the pads, the ball rolls over to the leg side and they rush across
on the middle stump line, cutting in a touch, Rohit pushes it to the on side
full and on the middle and leg, Rohit played around his front pad - which was pressed across - to midwicket
Classy pull. Short of length and coming in towards the off stump, he got into superb position to dismiss it to midwicket boundary
on a length, holding its line outside off stump, punched to extra cover
full in length, driven to mid-off
reaches for a deliver a tad wide outside off and square drives uppishly towards backward point. Shahadat cried out, "Catch" but realised quickly that it was not going to carry
again that front leg is pressed a touch too much across and he has to play around the front pad to drive to mid-on
Hmm ... Rohit presses his front leg across, tries to stop its movement and get the bat in front of the pad to on drive and gets a leading edge over the bowler and to the right of mid-off
from wide of the crease, on the middle and leg, worked to square leg
short and well outside off stump, cut hard but can't beat the backward point fielder
cuts in from a length, towards off stump, edges a punch to midwicket. He then practises playing it in the V
beaten outside off stump. Slower delivery and Rohit tries to cut it to third man and misses

full and outside off stump, Rohit planted his back leg in front of the off stump and square drove it to left of covers where Farhad Reza makes another fine diving stop.  The tigers are prowling the inner circle.
just outside off stump, dabbed to right of backward point
stands tall to push a length delivery just outside off stump to extra cover
plants his front leg towards off stump and mistimes a pull over midwicket.
on the off stump line, guided to backward point
well outside the off stump, full and Gambhir stretches across to drive it through wide mid-off
full again but on the middle and off stump line, wafted across the line to short midwicket. Gambhir suggests he should have played it straighter
on the pads, fails to connect with the glance but will pick two leg byes
beaten on the cut. Angling away from Gambhir who likes to cut on the length irrespective of the line. He got cramped for room there.
And there is that charge down the track. He does it now and then to unsettle the seamers. He carved this length delivery over mid-off
cuts in towards middle and leg, turned to midwicket
short of length, shaping in just outside off stump, Rohit stands tall to work it to wide mid-on , sets off for a single before sending Gambhir back
leans across to cream a full-length delivery on the up through covers.
beaten by an off cutter. Rohit tried to punch it on the up  down the track but the ball cut in to thread the bat and pad gap
gets closer to the line of a similar delivery to punch it to mid-on. Mehrab Hossain Jr, the sub, lobs a wild throw way above Rahim's head. Totally unnecessary. They were not even taking the single.
leans forward to drive past the diving Mehrab Jr at mid-on
short of length and just outside off stump, Gambhir stands still on the leg stump guard and cuts it through backward point.
fuller in length, around the off stump and he opens the bat-face to push it to right of backward point for a single

Shahadat takes out Rohit. Again the front leg movement got him into trouble. He pressed it too far across, had to bring his bat around the front pad, and hence, was in not great balance while trying to flick it and couldn't keep the ball down. Caught at midwicket. Bangladesh are on the ascent here.
welcomes Raina with a bounce on leg and middle line, swayed away
short of length, moving towards off and middle, Raina shuffles across to get behind the line and defends down the track
pitched up to him, driven uppishly past point fielder
coming in towards middle stump, with the arm, Gambhir backs away to punch it to covers
stays to his original stance and clips a delivery angling into middle and leg behind square leg

threatens to charge down, the bowler drags the length and is pulled past midwicket. Deep square leg and deep midwicket fielder (Tamim) collide and Tamim is injured as the other fielder banged into his head. Tamim now walks off the field, holding a icepack to his head.
slower through the air, on the middle stump line, defended down the track
skips down the track and on drives to mid-on
again comes down the track and drives to long-off
short of length outside off stump, cut to left of backward point for a single

Super stop by Raqibul at backward point. Raina blasted it to his right and he went flying to make the stop. And what's more, recovered quickly to fire in a throw at the non-striker's end. Rahim runs to congratulate Raqibul.
Not even Raqibul can stop that. Blasted well clear of him to the deep point boundary. Too short and not much pace from Reza.
turned to backward square leg
leans forward to dab to left of midwicket
retains the strike with a dab down to wide third man
hands the strike to Gambhir with a dab to square leg.
takes couple of steps down the track, the bowler bowls it on a yorker length outside off stump, driven to deep cover
Raina goes back to punch a flat delivery to long-off
fires it short, flat, and quick on the off and middle line, Gambhir rocks back to pull it midwicket boundary
Gambhir reaches yet another fifty with a flat-batted strike over long-on. He came down the track and swat-pulled a full toss over the ropes.
on the middle and leg, defended to the on side
spins in to the off stump line, nudged to backward point region
threatens to jump out before going back to cut to point
pulled just over the midwicket fielder. It was short in length and flat, Raina went back to crash it to the boundary
leans forward to work it to midwicket
turns a delivery spinning into him behind square leg
again that threat of coming down forces the bowler to a tad short and outside off and Gambhir rocks back to cut it through backward point.
on the off stump line, punched to wide long-off
low full toss outside off stump, Gambhir goes hard at the drive and edges it on to his pad
short of length, outside off stump, cut to short third man
comes down the track, gets too close to the ball and digs it out back to the bowler
well outside off stump, left alone
similar delivery, moves close to the line and mistimes a cut to extra cover

dropped by Farhad Reza. Oh what a miss. Gambhir charged down the track and ended up slicing a lofted shot towards point and Reza never looked confident as he came under the swirling delivery and spilled it. Mortaza can't believe that his man has dropped a simple chance and holds his head. It bobbed off his palms, on to his left shoulder and fell to his side.
on a length, on the leg stump line, pushes to the leg side. Ashraful encourages his team-mates and Reza has a sheepish smile on his face
leans forward to defend a slow off cutter on the middle and off stump line
full in length, on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
backed away to the leg side and crashed a full pitched delivery in the air over extra cover.
turns in towards the off stump, quick, pushed to the on side
leans forward, taps towards backward point and sets off for a run but is sent back by Raina
quick, flat, on the middle and off, jabbed down the track
flatter trajectory again, pushed to long-on
short and quick outside off stump, skids under the bat as Raina misses the cut shot
pushed to wide mid-on region
on the middle and leg, turned to leg side for a single

dropped by Mahmudullah at fine leg. They have caught the Indian virus. Raina top-edged a pull shot and it came down to Mahmud who lets it slip through his fingers. What is happening out there? The ground fielding has been fab but the catching ...

hello?! What was Raina doing there now? He charged like a mad bull and had a wild heave at a length delivery, missed it completely. Adrenalish rush. They have spiked the drinks. Both the fielders and the batsman are showing after effects!
leans forward to defend.
Brutal. He pulled a short-of-length delivery over deep midwicket. Some thing has happened in the break!
bouncer and Taufel calls it a wide
Another short-pitched delivery, another pull, another boundary. The game is moving at a frenetic pace now.
worked through the on side for a single
goes back to punch to wide mid-on
spins down the leg side, turned straight to backward square leg. He should have put that one away
fuller and on the off stump line, driven to covers
leans forward to ease a full delivery to long-on
outside off stump, cut to point
full length delivery on the middle stump line, defended down the track
full in length, outside off stump, steered to third man.
lands on a length on the leg stump line, moves in towards leg and middle, Raina gets behind the line to jab it down the track.
gets forward to defend a length delivery on the off stump line.
edged past the 'keeper. Fullish and outside off stump, Raina edges the intended cover drive past the diving Rahim.
pitches in on a length, moves it towards middle stump line, worked to midwicket
goes back to work a short-of-length delivery to left of midwicket
wide down the leg side
slows up the pace, flights it well outside off stump, Raina is made to stretch across and he drives to covers.
goes back to work a delivery turning in to midwicket
stays back to punch a length delivery to straightish midwicket
backs to the leg side and flays a flat length delivery just outside off to the cover boundary. He created his own line by moving away
dabs a delivery on the off stump line to short third man
steps down the track, moves outside leg and drives a length delivery inside-out to the left of mid-off. The Indian charge is on.
moving across Gambhir who runs it down to third man
bangs in a bouncer on the leg and middle line, Raina ducks and sways towards the off stump to evade. The bat was held up like a periscope, though.
Rahim screams for a caught behind decision and Taufel shakes his head before extending his arms. It was the high bouncer and Raina couldn't connect with the pull.
fuller, driven to mid-off
sweetly timed extra-cover drive. Full pitched outside off stump and he went through the line.
clears his front leg from the the line and lofts a full length delivery towards wide long-on. He got more elevation than necessary and won't get a boundary.
leans across to drive, misses and inside edges to the pad. Rahim lets out a hopeful appeal for lbw
worked to backward square leg
comes down the track and on drives a full delivery outside off to long-on
drives to right of the bowler who fields
quicker, flatter, shorter and Raina goes back to force it to long-on
comes down the track, Razzak slows up the pace and it dips in front of Raina who lunges to ease it to long-on
on the off stump line, cut to backward point
comes down the track, almost yorks himself but digs it out to the off side
threatens to jump out before cutting the short-of-length delivery to backward point
charges down this time and drives inside-out to sweeper cover
reaches forward to ping long-off
pushed to extra cover
spins in, turned to square leg
leans forward to push a flighted delivery to the on side of the pitch
full delivery but Raina goes back and tries to punch to long-on but the bowler moves quickly to his left to intercept
gets it past the bowler this time as he leans forward and drives to long-on
comes down the track, lunges forward to push to long-on for another single
full, on the off and middle, driven to the bowler
down the track and he takes it on the full but drives straight to sweeper cover
leans forward t o defend a delivery on the middle
drags this one short and Raina opens his stance to pull it to deep midwicket
again jumps down the track, the bowler fires it full and outside off, Gambhir crouches to drive to deep cover
on the middle stump line, punched down to long-on
outside off stump, flat, dabbed to point
takes a step forward and on drives past midwicket
down the leg side and tucked to long leg
stretches forward to off drive but edges it down the track as the bowler had slowed up the pace on that ball
goes back to force a length delivery turning in to long-on and that's his fifth ODI fifty. He is in some form in this tourney.
short of length and Gambhir pulls to deep midwicket
leans forward to drive to long-on
long hop and dismissed to deep midwicket boundary
fuller, outside off, defended on the front foot
goes back, opens up his stance and punches a delivery coming in to long-on
He gives charge and drives a flighted delivery inside-out superbly to wide long-off boundary.
goes back to a push it to the on side
outside off stump, full, steered to point
outside off stump, steered to backward point
goes back to steer a full delivery to left of backward point
down the leg side, misses a sweep
full and outside off, pushed to extra cover
just outside the off stump, squeezed to backward point
short and down leg side, pulled to left of long leg where Shahadat makes a tumbling stop
length delivery slipping down leg, brushes the thigh pad and Rahim can only make a half-stop
on the pads, turned to fine leg
length delivery, punched on the up to covers
full pitched on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
A tad short in length, on the off stump, Raina goes for a pull shot, top edges it but it clears mid-on
leans forward to drive to long-off
leans forward to on drive to deep midwicket
slows up the pace, on the middle stump line, dabbed to midwicket
leans forward to ease it to long-on
goes back to punch a googly to left of deep cover
on the middle stump line, wristed past square leg and they run hard to come back for the second run
couple of steps down the pitch and a fluent drive to long-on gets him a single
stands tall to punch a length delivery to long-off
Charges down the track. Moves outside leg. Drives inside-out over extra cover. The signature Gambhir charge.
cut to wide third man region, again they sprint across to make it two runs

Finally, a catch has been taken. Mortaza, the fast bowler, swoops low at midwicket to hold it. Gambhir couldn't keep the on drive down and ended up chipping it. But it has been another potentially match-winning knock from the left-hander.
leans forward to drive to the off side
full and outside off, goes for the big drive and misses
full, just outside off stump, dug out to the off side
short delivery, pulled to deep midwicket
full and on the middle and leg, whipped through the on side
goes back to punch to long-off
leans forward to on drive to long-on
on a length, drives to mid-off
fullish, jabbed to on side
outside the off stump, square driven to deep cover. 200 up
down the leg side, faint ticke down and Rahim makes a diving half stop
full pitched on the leg and middle line, driven back to the bowler
low full toss, outside the off stump and Raina swings it cleanly over extra cover
what a sweetly timed stroke. He went back to punch it and I thought It was going for a single to long-on but he couldn't get across in time
goes back to turn to midwicket
stays back to ease a length delivery to long-on
outside the off stump, punched to deep cover
googly on the middle and leg, defended down the track
full in length, driven on the up to long-off
comes down the track but mistimes a drive to right of mid-off
slips down leg, flicked to fine leg
Monster devilish hit over long-on. The front leg was taken off the line and the bat came down fast, smooth and completed the full arc.
beaten by a yorker just outside the off stump
backs away a touch and drives on  bent knee to deep cover region
on the pads, clipped through midwicket
on a length, around off stump, pushed square to point
short and outside the off stump, chopped to deep point
short of length and keeps low, Raina was on the hop and had to push back to earth  in a hurry and jabbed it through cover point
tries to drive a length delivery on middle and off on the up and edges it to his front pad
walks down the track and whips a fullish delivery to deep midwicket
slower one, short of length, Raina is early into his pull shot and will pick up a leg bye
stands tall to punch to deep cover
Raina goes for a pull to a slightly short of length delivery and drags it uppishly to midwicket and the fielder couldn't get his palms under it as he dived forward
swing and a miss. Make it a big swing and a miss. He wanted to send a full delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
almost takes out Raina who dives to escape being hit. It was drilled really hard past Raina
outside the off stump and Yuvraj plays and misses
gets behind the line of a full delivery on middle and leg and clips it behind square leg
on a length, on middle stump line, pushed to the off side
slow off cutter on the middle stump line, dabbed towards backward point and they get across for a quick single
bouncer on the leg and middle line, Raina half-ducks and sways towards off to get away from that
dug this short outside off, Raina got on his toes and cut it down to cover point
another bouncer on the leg stump line, Raina evades it in his usual fashion, like he did in the 4th ball of this over
turns into middle and leg, worked to deep backward square leg
short and pulled to right of deep midwicket for couple of runs
long hop and Raina goes back to blast it into midwicket stands. on 96 now. 50 of the partnership is up

Hundred no 2 for Raina. Suddenly, he has found the oasis after wading through the desert in international cricket. It was down leg side and he helped it to fine-leg boundary. And he rushes towards Yuvraj who envelops him with a bear hug
goes back to punch back to the bowler
drives to long-off for a single
short and outside off stump, mistimes the cut to covers
sharp and well directed bouncer on the middle stump line, Raina ducked and realised he can't sway to the off as the ball was chasing in and ducked more to get out of that jail
a harmless very high bouncer on the leg stump line this time. Raina didn't have to sweat to get away from that

dropped by Reza at deep cover. It was supremely timed from Raina - who went back to smoke a full delivery - and Reza palmed it over his head like a football goalkeeper. Too much Euro 2008 on the telly these days.
fuller on the legs, turned to the on side

The bouncer hits him on the back. Knowing that Raina likes to sway towards off, Shahadat hurled the short one towards middle and off and Raina ducked and swayed but obviously was not enough to wriggle away from that bouncer.
on a length, around off stump, slanting away from Yuvraj who pushes it to point
floated outside off, slog swept to deep midwicket where Reza fumbles but recovers quickly
wide down the leg side
shaped to slog sweep but saw the fuller length, tried to adjust by paddling it away, missed and it bobbed off his pad over Rahim's head
waltzes down the track and scythes a lofted delivery over long-off
inside edges a pull to short fine-leg region
floated full on the leg stump line, Raina doesn't connect with the swing across the line and they will take the leg bye
leans forward to drive a single down to long-on.
hurls across a bouncer on leg and middle line, Yuvraj pulled it very well to deep backward square leg boundary. He got top of it really well and hit it to the ground
fuller, on a length, slanted across Yuvraj who tries to lift it over covers but can't get wood on leather
Magnificent blow over midwicket. It was short of length and moving towards off stump but Yuvraj pulled it violently over midwicket boundary. Six no 96 in ODIs for Yuvraj.
outside off stump, punched to the off side
bangs it short, on the middle and off, Raina doesn't do his half-duck, half-sway routine this time but stays adjacent to the line, gets on his toes and steers to third man

on a length, around off stump, guided to backward point. He was looking to have a go at anything full or short, was in to his position but saw that this was a good length delivery and tried to take a single to third man but couldn't beat the backward point fielder
wide down the leg side
slower through the air, turning in from outside off stump, Raina goes back to push it through extra cover for couple of runs
quicker, on the middle and leg, turned to fine leg for the single that does the job for India. Raina has hit 300-run mark in this tournament and India have registered yet another emphatic victory.
